author: bridge-bot
content:
<sam_cm> re: **@shekhirin**
> gm guys, where can we see what new images were deployed? Looks like around 2am Reth got updated and it improved p50, want to know what was the version before and  after :)
We'll add it to Lab, but for now I've added annotations to this dash: https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/goto/qKXJpa4vR?orgId=1 (same data)

Should be able to view all clients up the top, and then per-client annotations in the client deep dives

author: bridge-bot
content:
<amezianehamlat> re: **@marcin_d_s**
> Hi @amezianehamlat ! I used a data from https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/feo4ronhsqv40d/opcodes-benchmarking
Under the hood it uses test cases with fixed opcode counts. There will be a new iteration of these, most likely tomorrow.
@louistsai is an expert in fixed opcode test cases
@louistsai where can I find fixed opcode test cases ?

author: bridge-bot
content:
<louistsai> re: **@amezianehamlat**
> @louistsai where can I find fixed opcode test cases ?
All of them are under this folder, please match the test name there, thanks
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/tree/forks/amsterdam/tests/benchmark/compute
